name: AI_SetCondition_OnTimer
documentation: Sets the given condition of the given player after the give amount of minutes to true (=10000).

parameters.name: TimeInitial
parameters.documentation: Time before the TimeTrueCycle (with the other duration) starts. Condition is `false`. Given in twelves of a second (=> 120 is 10 seconds). Rounded to 10 seconds.

parameters.name: TimeTrueCycle
parameters.documentation: Time frame where the condition stays on `true`. Given in 640th of a minute (6400 => 10 minutes). Rounded to 10 seconds. Switches to the TimeFalseCycle when out of time.

parameters.name: TimeFalseCycle
parameters.documentation: Time frame where the condition stays on `false`. Given in 640s of a minute (6400 => 10 minutes). Rounded to 10 seconds. Switches to the TimeTrueCycle when out of time.
